posts.post_content: I have the following SGC T-206 cards for sale all prices are shipped either Paypal + 3%, Paypal money owed or money orders are fine also. I am selling roughly half of collection and will be posting others in small bunches soon. Thanks for looking. Dennis.                                                                                       Frank Delehanty SGC 30-Piedmont 350 $30 , Maddox SGC 30- Piedmont 350-$27.
